places_with_reviews.name: Landmark Hotel Bhilwara
address: Chittorgarh Rd, near Circuit House, Basant Vihar Colony, Santosh Colony, Bhilwara, Rajasthan 311001, India

reviews.text: Location best suits me, it's just walking distance from bhilwara station, Rooms are clean, suite are spacious, value for Money, only buffet breakfast was not available as occupancy was low.
Worst place to stay in bhilwara. They mistreat women. They declined women passenger to use their washroom and misbehaved with them. Even asked for money to use their washroom.
Courteous staff... Receptionist is too professional which was really great... perfect hygiene, cleanliness...
Hotel location is good... Rooms size is also good enough... Staff behaviour is polite and humble... Food quality is also good.. I would rate 7/10

Best hotel if you are commuting via private buses , it’s in front on Bhilwara private bus parking.
Food & staff was also good.
Mr Yadav gave me early check in around 7 am which was unexpected but I appreciate that.
I travelled from Delhi and bus dropped me in front of this hotel.
It’s next to hotel landmark & you can visit rock bar terrace cafe which is at backside of this hotel.

places_with_reviews.name: The Imperial Prime Clarks Inn Suites Bhilwara
address: 200 Feet, Ring Rd, Gokul Vihar, Haled, Bhilwara, Rajasthan 311001, India

reviews.text:
Location: Situated amidst the lush Desert of Rajasthan, The Imperial Prime Clarks Inn Suites Bhilwara offers a serene escape from the hustle and bustle of city life.

Ambiance: The moment you step into the lobby, you are greeted by an ambiance of relaxation and luxury. The décor is tastefully appointed, with earthy tones and contemporary furnishings that complement the natural surroundings. The soothing sounds of flowing water from nearby fountains further enhance the peaceful atmosphere.

Accommodation: The rooms at The Imperial Prime Clarks Inn Suites Bhilwara are a haven of comfort and style. Each room is thoughtfully designed with modern amenities and plush furnishings to ensure a restful stay. The beds are incredibly comfortable, guaranteeing a good night's sleep, while the spacious bathrooms are equipped with luxurious toiletries and rainfall showers.

Dining: The hotel's restaurant offers a culinary journey that delights the senses. From gourmet breakfast spreads to delectable dinner menus featuring locally sourced ingredients, every meal is a treat for the taste buds. Guests can also enjoy alfresco dining on the terrace, surrounded by the beauty of nature.

Facilities: The Imperial Prime Clarks Inn Suites Bhilwara boasts a range of facilities to cater to every guest's needs. Whether you want to unwind with a massage at the spa, take a refreshing dip in the infinity pool, or stay active at the fitness center, there's something for everyone. Additionally, the hotel offers concierge services to assist with any requests or arrangements during your stay.

Service: The service at The Imperial Prime Clarks Inn Suites Bhilwara is exemplary, with staff members who are attentive, friendly, and always willing to go the extra mile to ensure a memorable experience for guests. From the warm welcome upon arrival to the personalized assistance throughout your stay, every interaction with the staff is marked by professionalism and hospitality.

Overall Experience: The Imperial Prime Clarks Inn Suites Bhilwara offers a perfect blend of luxury, tranquility, and hospitality, making it an ideal destination for those seeking a rejuvenating getaway. Whether you're looking to reconnect with nature, indulge in culinary delights, or simply unwind in a peaceful setting, this hotel exceeds expectations on every front. A stay at The Imperial Prime Clarks Inn Suites Bhilwara is not just a vacation—it's an unforgettable experience that leaves you feeling refreshed, revitalized, and eager to return.

The Imperial Prime Clarks Inn Suites in Bhilwara is an excellent choice, whether for weddings, business trips, or holidays. The luxurious ambiance and well-designed architecture create a perfect setting. Comfortable rooms, a beautiful garden, and a refreshing swimming pool enhance the overall experience. The positive vibes of the environment make it an ideal destination. With the reputable Clarks brand, it stands out as a top-notch place for various occasions.
The hotel is good and the behavior of the staff is also good, guests of both bride and groom can stay here, it has around 100 rooms available. This hotel is about 8 kilometers from the city
Great !! #most popular n liked wedding destination in Bhilwara city with great view front and reception with large garden area with romantic smiming pool site with clean water.

Large parking outside hotel wall but its fenced and is for marriage parties. Also 10-15 car parking inside the concrete walls of hotel. Food is average. Washroom was adequately functional. Plenty ie 10-15 hairs on pillow. 3 hairs on bedsheet. The linen was used one and not changed. The kettle was not working. Lift makea sudden strange noises. Staff is helpful and sorted out all problems. Washroom gives small bottles of shampoo and body wash only.

places_with_reviews.name: Orica Resort
address: 200 Feet Ring Road Near Hanuman Circle, Eras, Road, Bhilwara, Eras, Rajasthan 311001, India

reviews.text:
Orica Resort could be considered as a good choice only for wedding functions or large parties. There are 2 spacious lawn area where large gatherings can be enjoyed the function. Rooms are spacious and equipped with all the basic facilities. Total 90 rooms are there in this resort. A huge spacious hall fir parties is available at the basement of the hotel area. Spacious kitchen area is there where the host can make arrangements for their food preparation.

The major negative point is that there is no restaurant inside the resort. Hence this resort only becomes good choice if you have large gatherings or you have your own arrangement for food and all. Otherwise thinking of this resort will be too harsh on pocket and will be meaning less.

The perfect wedding destination. We recently had my brother's wedding out there & I just totally loved it. Everything was good from big spacious garden to good sizable banquet hall, pool, well-quality rooms & the staff behavior was really helpful.

The resort is perfect to go for any wedding or outing with your loved ones. The thing which I want to suggest is that the mirrors in the room are behind the door so it is very difficult to use the mirror along with the door's disturbance. It is suggested to change the mirror's location in the rooms.

Orika Resort is located near Iras Crossroads, 5 km from Roadways Bus Stand. There is a huge garden here where many types of functions can be organized and there is also a swimming pool.The rooms here are quite nice and well furnished. It is a very suitable resort for wedding ceremonies.
Awesome resort. We attended a marriage function there. Nice rooms and banquet.

places_with_reviews.name: Delice Hotel
address: Old RTO Rd, Gandhi Nagar, Bhilwara, Rajasthan 311001, India

reviews.text:
This is my first time in Bhilwara. I chose to go for lunch at the Delice Hotel based on feedback from my friend.

My family and I went for lunch, and we were pleasantly surprised by the high-tech environment, cleanliness, and excellent service. Every dish we ordered had a unique and delightful flavor.

The food looked delicious, and we were so hungry that we forgot to take pictures. Nevertheless, you can get an idea of how great the taste was.

My stay at Hotel Dlice in Bhilwara was delightful. The room I stayed in was conveniently located and impeccably clean. It had all the basic amenities I needed, including a tea kettle, fridge, and wardrobe, making my stay comfortable and convenient. The attention to detail in ensuring these amenities were provided was impressive. Overall, I had a pleasant experience and would highly recommend Hotel Dlice to anyone visiting Bhilwara.

It's a beautiful Property. All important  places are  nearby. Huge property with good rooms. Natural beauty. Good Horticulture work and lawns. The food is quite good and the staff is attentive. The prices are cheaper in non-seasonal time. Very peaceful and serene place. Business area. Parking is available. Roof top restaurant and bar

Everything seemed perfect, as we stayed for a night. Bhavika and Muskan were amazing in hosting us at the hotel as well as the restaurant. If you are traveling from abroad, like US, you will like staying here for its cleanliness and hospitality! True to India and Bhilwara!

The hotel has a very nice rooftop restaurant. the decor and feel of the restaurant is good. Food is also decent. The staff is very cooperwtive and they would go out of their way to help you. Would definitely recommend this place.

places_with_reviews.name: Ranbanka Heritage Resort Bhilwara
address: 8JWG+27Q Khamore House, Old RTO Rd, Gandhi Nagar, Bhilwara, Rajasthan 311001, India

reviews.text: This hotel offers an exceptional experience with its inviting ambience and delicious breakfast options. The social house restaurant provides a vibrant atmosphere for guests to unwind, complemented by a picturesque pool area. Impeccable service and a variety of amenities make it a top choice for travelers seeking comfort and relaxation.

Poor on service and lack basic sense of hospitality.

The design and feel of the hotel is great along with the food taste.

Hot water needs to be asked on reception even in the peak hour of morning

Basic toiletries and towels, bottles water needs to be asked multiple times

Would expect to improve on service and basic services to match the food and ambience quality

Dear Management,

I regret to inform you that my recent stay at your establishment was highly unsatisfactory due to several glaring issues with the management and facilities provided. I feel compelled to provide feedback to ensure improvements are made for future guests.

Firstly, the condition of the room was unacceptable. Wires were visibly protruding from the walls and sockets, posing a safety hazard. Additionally, the bed mattress was worn out and uncomfortable, hindering any chance of a restful sleep.

Moreover, the inconvenience of being asked to pay in cash only, with no option for online or card payments, especially late at night, was highly inconvenient and outdated. This lack of flexibility is unacceptable in today’s digital age.

Furthermore, the absence of basic amenities such as water bottles, with only RO water available, was disappointing. Guests should have easy access to essentials for their comfort and convenience.

The lack of attentiveness and professionalism from the staff further added to the dissatisfaction. Chewing gutkha at the reception and during service interactions is not only unhygienic but also reflects poorly on the establishment’s standards.

Overall, my experience was so subpar that I would advise others to avoid staying at your hotel altogether. It is disheartening to say that I would have received better service and accommodations at a roadside hotel.

I hope you take this feedback seriously and implement necessary changes to improve the quality of your establishment for future guests.

Our dinner experience at Hotel Ran Bakura was delightful. We started with refreshing drinks - a strawberry shake and lime water, both of which were refreshing and well-prepared. For our main course, we enjoyed paneer tikka masala, yellow dal tadka, and mixed vegetables accompanied by garlic naan and lachha paratha. The food was delicious, with each dish bursting with flavor and prepared to perfection. The ambiance near the swimming pool added to the overall dining experience, creating a beautiful and relaxing atmosphere. The service was prompt and attentive, ensuring a pleasant dining experience from start to finish. I would highly recommend Hotel Ran Bakura to anyone looking for delicious food and a lovely ambiance in Bhilwara.

They call themselves Heritage property, but it's the worst I had ever stayed after paying for a luxury stay. Their rooms stink, not at all maintained. Poor room service. Surrounding is so unhygienic and dirty. Only one thing positive was, their breakfast was tasty inspite of having very less options.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel BMD The Grand Bhilwara - Best Hotel & Restaurants In Bhilwara
address: Chandrashekar Azad Nagar, Bhilwara, Rajasthan 311001, India

reviews.text: Had dinner here twice. Menu is all vegetarian. Found the quality of food is very good as per a city like Bhilwara. We ordered Indian food, and it turned out to be quite delicious. The location of the hotel is also excellent. Hope they maintain the quality in the near future.

It used to be a good hotel. But not now. No hospitality, cleanliness compromised. Washrooms were stinking.
Location is far away from station. no sense of staying at such hotel. There are some far better options in main city.

A good hotel with to stay at chandreshekhar Azad Nagar Bhilwara having all amenities. Staff are friendly and courteous. Rooms are clean and spacious and beds are comfortable. There are having good parking also. Restaurant is available on the terrace both open and closed. Birthday party are organised here. Food is good. Service is excellent. Overall a good stay experience.

Dined at the restaurant, and the experience fell in the middle ground. The ambiance was comfortable, but the menu lacked the excitement expected for a memorable meal. The service was adequate, though not outstanding. Flavors were decent, yet some dishes left room for improvement. With a few tweaks, this place has the potential to rise above mediocrity. A fair choice, but there are better options in town.

The birthday celebration at the restaurant was spoiled by a spicy sizzler that was too hot to handle. The mood soured when our request to replace the dish was dismissed with a curt, “the dish is made like this only.” The manchow soup and vanilla shake were average, and the mix fresh lime soda was excessively sweet.

It is a very nice place to stay and the staff is also very supportive, the services regarding anything are also very good here.

reviews.text: I'm happy to provide feedback on Flora Park. Based on my experience, I'd rate it 4 stars. The reason for this rating is the beautiful and well-maintained gardens, friendly staff, and convenient location. However, there's always room for improvement, perhaps enhancing the variety of activities and amenities would make it a 5-star destination.

places_with_reviews.name: The Navkar Hotel Bhilwara
address: near Aashika Hotel, Bhilwara, Rajasthan 311001, India

reviews.text:
Wedding destination property.
Too huge for a big fat Indian wedding
2 floors with ground floor.
Rooms are too spacious.
Beautiful constructed.
Indoor and outdoor space is too big.
Rainy season can’t destroy your functions.

Overall a great place to organise your functions.
It’s near by Bhilwara from the way from atun village.
This place is awesome for marriage function and parties, nicely maintained and organised.

I recently had the pleasure of attending a wedding at Navkar Hotel in Bhilwara, Rajasthan and I must say, it was an incredible experience! The hotel's spacious and well-designed banquet halls are perfect for hosting grand weddings and can accommodate a large number of guests with ease.

The staff at Navkar Hotel were incredibly attentive and accommodating, making sure that every detail of the wedding was executed flawlessly.

The hotel's location is also a major plus point, as it is easily accessible from all parts of the city. Additionally, ample parking is available on-site, which is a big advantage for guests who are driving.

The rooms were spacious and well-appointed, ensuring that all guests had a comfortable stay. Overall, I highly recommend Navkar Hotel as a wedding venue. If you're looking for a luxurious and memorable wedding experience, this hotel is definitely worth considering!
Perfect for organising functions and even weddings.
